Package com.team3824.akmessing1.scoutingapp.activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatabaseManagement
    Activity for resetting the database tables for the current event or removing all of them from the database
    DriveTeamFeedback
    Activity for the Drive Team to input comments about alliance partners during qualification matches.
    EliminationMatchList
    Activity which contains Alliance Selection Fragments and Bracket Results fragments in order to set up Elimination Match Views.
    EventView
    This activity shows a table comparing all the teams at the current event.
    FileView  
    HomeScreen
    The home screen for the app.
    MatchList
    Activity which displays each match as a button to lead into Match Scouting, Super Scouting, or Match View.
    MatchPlanning
    Activity where the user can draw on a canvas where the background is the field.
    MatchSchedule
    Displays the match schedule for the current event with markers for teams that we will play with, against, both in future matches as well as our matches.
    MatchScouting
    Activity that holds the fragments for scouting matches.
    MatchView  
    PickList
    Activity that holds the fragments for the different pick lists
    PitScouting
    Activity that holds the fragments for pit scouting
    ScheduleBuilder
    Admin Activity to modify the schedule for the current event
    Server
    Activity that listens for bluetooth connections, receives data and requests for data, aggregates the data, and logs.
    Settings  
    SuperScouting
    Activity that holds all the fragments for super scouting
    SyncActivity
    Admin Activity to control sending and requesting data to and from the other tablets
    TeamList
    Activity to show all the teams as buttons that lead to the Team View
    TeamListBuilder
    Admin activity to add and remove teams from the team list
    TeamView
    The activity that holds all the fragments that display the collected information about a given team.
